description.description: Helped bring the powers of the web and data visualization to smart traffic light managment at a Tel-Aviv-based startup NoTraffic.

content.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"At NoTraffic, I...","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Developed web tools and applications for troubleshooting and analysis.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Built a customer-ready real-time transport corridor visualization page for the platform.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Created unit testing scripts for new traffic sensor features.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Worked on managing database problems and researched effective framework alternatives to migrate.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"In the process, I ended up developing my skills in AngularJS, Django, redux, visualization libraries, and unit testing. More excitingly, my internship was part of a larger startup immersion program, which gave me the opportunity to get aquitanted with the Tel Aviv entrepreneruship culture through the support of Adelson School of Entrepreneurship.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Because of the nature of the work, I am keeping these descriptions brief, but if you are curious to learn more about my experience, feel free to contact me!","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
